definition: a package of several things tied together for carrying or storing, to sleep fully clothed in the same bed with one's betrothed
details:
noun
- a package of several things tied together for carrying or storing
= synonyms: sheaf
- a collection of things wrapped or boxed together
= synonyms: parcel
- a large sum of money, especially as pay or profit
= example: a large sum of money, especially as pay or profit
= synonyms: pile
verb
- to sleep fully clothed in the same bed with one's betrothed
= example: to sleep fully clothed in the same bed with one's betrothed
= synonyms: practice bundling
- to compress into a wad
= example: to compress into a wad
= synonyms: compact
- to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
= example: to gather or cause to gather into a cluster
= synonyms: clump, bunch, cluster, bunch up
- to make into a bundle
= example: to make into a bundle
= synonyms: bundle up, roll up
